attribute.name: casualty
attribute.description: The selected casualty of the component.

attribute.name: casualties
attribute.description: A list of possible casualties that can be selected. (default: casualtyService.casualties)

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Label to display. (default: "Sinistro: ")

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Marks component as required. (default: true)

attribute.name: requiredMessage
attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails. (default: "Selecione um sinitro!!!")

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: Disables component. (default: false)

attribute.name: converter
attribute.description: Converter identifier of the Converter instance to be created and registered. (default: casualtyConverter)

attribute.name: update
attribute.description: Component(s) to update with ajax.

attribute.name: noSelectionItemLabel
attribute.description: Label to display when none option was selected yet. (default: "Selecione um ...")

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: The selectOneMenu component effect type. (default: "fade")

attribute.name: filter
attribute.description: Displays an input filter for the list. (default: true)

attribute.name: filterMatchMode
attribute.description: Match mode for filtering, valid values are startsWith, contains, endsWith and custom. (default: "startsWith")

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style of the component.

attribute.name: labelStyle
attribute.description: Inline style of the component label.

attribute.name: panelStyle
attribute.description: Inline style of the component panel.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Match employee type, valid values are employee, subordinate, supervisor and manager. (default: "employee")

attribute.name: employee
attribute.description: The selected employee of the component.

attribute.name: employees
attribute.description: A list of possible employees that can be selected. (default: employeeService.employees)
